001package org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.buildinfo;
002
003import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonGetter;
004import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonIgnore;
005import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonInclude;
006import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonPropertyOrder;
007import org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.datetime.DateTimeTriplet;
008
009import java.util.Collections;
010import java.util.List;
011import java.util.NavigableMap;
012
013@JsonInclude(JsonInclude.Include.NON_EMPTY)
014@JsonPropertyOrder({
015    "maven-coordinates",
016    "resource-path",
017    "build-date-time",
018    "project-group",
019    "project-artifact",
020    "project-version",
021    "minimal-jdk-version",
022    "loading-errors",
023})
024public interface BuildInfo {
025
026    @JsonGetter("resource-path")
027    String getResourcePath();
028
029    @JsonIgnore
030    NavigableMap<String, String> getProjectProps();
031
032    @JsonGetter("project-group")
033    String getProjectGroup();
034
035    @JsonGetter("project-artifact")
036    String getProjectArtifact();
037
038    @JsonGetter("project-version")
039    String getProjectVersion();
040
041    @JsonGetter("maven-coordinates")
042    default String getMavenCoordinates() {
043        return getProjectGroup() + ":" + getProjectArtifact() + ":" + getProjectVersion();
044    }
045
046    /**
047     * @return data-time, when the build was made, as {@link DateTimeTriplet}
048     */
049    @JsonIgnore
050    DateTimeTriplet getBuildDateTime();
051
052    @JsonGetter("build-date-time")
053    default String getBuildDateTimeStr() {
054        return getBuildDateTime() == null ? null : getBuildDateTime().dumpNoWeek();
055    }
056
057    /**
058     * @return minimal version of JDK, when this library is in use
059     */
060    @JsonGetter("minimal-java-version")
061    String getMinimalJavaVersion();
062
063    /**
064     * @return if not empty - the list of errors that were discovered when loading the resource-content
065     */
066    @JsonGetter("loading-errors")
067    default List<String> getLoadingErrors() {
068        return Collections.emptyList();
069    }
070}
